yoast_head_json.title: Bar & Bat Mitzvahs | Exceptional Events at The Pier Sixty Collection
yoast_head_json.description: Celebrate your child’s Bar or Bat Mitzvah at NYC’s premier waterfront venues. The Pier Sixty Collection offers stunning Hudson River views, customizable spaces, and exceptional food and service to create unforgettable memories for your family and guests.
